{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408644329","pull_request_review_id":3307464011,"id":2408644329,"node_id":"PRRC_kwDOOcuOYs6PkP7p","diff_hunk":"@@ -564,6 +584,106 @@ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {\n         }\n     }\n \n+    // --- Edit Feed Logic ---\n+\n+    /**\n+     * Handles the click event for a feed widget's edit button.\n+     * @param {number} feedId - The ID of the feed to edit.\n+     * @param {string} currentUrl - The current URL of the feed.\n+     * @param {string} currentName - The current name of the feed.\n+     */\n+    function handleEditFeed(feedId, currentUrl, currentName) {\n+        console.log(`Editing feed: ${feedId}`);\n+        \n+        const modal = document.getElementById('edit-feed-modal');\n+        const feedIdInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-id');\n+        const feedUrlInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-url');\n+        const feedNameInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-name');\n+        \n+        // Populate the form with current values\n+        feedIdInput.value = feedId;\n+        feedUrlInput.value = currentUrl;\n+        feedNameInput.value = currentName;\n+        \n+        // Show the modal\n+        modal.style.display = 'flex';\n+    }\n+\n+    /**\n+     * Handles the submission of the edit feed form.\n+     * @param {Event} event - The form submission event.\n+     */\n+    async function handleEditFeedSubmit(event) {\n+        event.preventDefault();\n+        \n+        const modal = document.getElementById('edit-feed-modal');\n+        const feedIdInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-id');\n+        const feedUrlInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-url');\n+        const saveButton = document.getElementById('save-feed-button');\n+        \n+        const feedId = parseInt(feedIdInput.value);\n+        const newUrl = feedUrlInput.value.trim();\n+        \n+        if (!newUrl) {\n+            alert('Please enter a feed URL');\n+            return;\n+        }\n+        \n+        // Disable the save button and show loading state\n+        const originalButtonText = saveButton.textContent;\n+        saveButton.disabled = true;\n+        saveButton.textContent = 'Saving...';\n+        \n+        try {\n+            const result = await fetchData(`/api/feeds/${feedId}`, {\n+                method: 'PUT',\n+                headers: {\n+                    'Content-Type': 'application/json'\n+                },\n+                body: JSON.stringify({ url: newUrl })\n+            });\n+            \n+            if (result) {\n+                console.log('Feed updated successfully:', result);\n+                // Close the modal\n+                modal.style.display = 'none';\n+                \n+                // Update just the edited widget instead of reloading entire tab\n+                const widget = document.querySelector(`.feed-widget[data-feed-id=\"${feedId}\"]`);\n+                if (widget) {\n+                    // Replace the widget with updated content\n+                    const newWidget = createFeedWidget(result);\n+                    widget.replaceWith(newWidget);","path":"frontend/script.js","commit_id":"c59180ab984f1f3e943e41588f4d34362e2c789c","original_commit_id":"c59180ab984f1f3e943e41588f4d34362e2c789c","user":{"login":"gemini-code-assist[bot]","id":176961590,"node_id":"BOT_kgDOCow4Ng","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/in/956858?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D","html_url":"https://github.com/apps/gemini-code-assist","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/received_events","type":"Bot","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"![critical](https://www.gstatic.com/codereviewagent/critical.svg)\n\nThis Consequently, `newWidget` is `undefined`, and `widget.replaceWith(newWidget)` will fail.\n\nThe ideal solution is to modify `createFeedWidget` to return the created widget element without appending it to the DOM. message.content: I can see there's a critical code review comment on PR #88. The issue is that the `createFeedWidget` function returns `undefined`, which causes a runtime error when trying to replace the widget. Let me check the full comment and then fix this issue:
